name: Interactive Regional Map of Europe
author: WP Map Plugins

sections.description:
Download this interactive map of Europe WordPress plugin and customize the map colours, links, hover description for each of the 5 regions through an easy to use admin panel without any coding knowledge, then insert the map shortcode in any page/post to display the map.

Are you looking for Premium Interactive Map of Europe with clickable countries?

Features:

  • Interactive map of Europe with 5 clickable European regions.
  • Does NOT require ANY coding knowledge.
  • Customize each region independently, so you can change colours, link, hover information for each region.
  • Easy to use admin panel interface.
  • Bulk edit option.
  • Works perfectly on desktop along with mobile devices including Smartphones: iPhone, iPad, Tablets, etc.
  • Install and customize the map in minutes then embed the shortcode in any page or post to display the map.

Other interesting maps: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, UK, Other country maps.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin .zip file through your WordPress ‘Plugins’ screen directly, or Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/interactive-map-of-europe directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Now, you will see a new menu button in the left side bar of your WordPress called ‘Europe Reg. Map’, click it and customize your map then save the changes.
  4. Use this shortcode [eur_map] to display the map in any page or post.
sections.faq:
Can I add an image in the hover popup?

Yes, you can write any text and add images.

Does this map requires Flash to work?

No, it’s SVG based and works perfectly on desktop along with mobile devices ‘smartphone’.

Is this map responsive?

Yes.

Can I split region into countries?

No, but fortunately we already have a Premium Interactive Map of Europe with clickable European countries.

Can I set a region such as British Isle as inactive?

Yes, simply un-check the (active) box beside that region to make it inactive.

Can I use the shortcode in different pages to display the same map?

Yes.

Can I create a different map and use it in another page?

No, but you can buy the Multiple Instances Regional Map of Europe Package to get 3 instances of the plugin and install each one to get a different styled map.

Can I link a region to any webpage?

Yes, also you can choose to open it in the same window or in a new window.

Do you offer special customization if needed?

Yes, we can customize the map for what you need as a freelance customization service, just contact us.
